# What is Quarto? {data-background-color="#425563" data-verticator="#E8EDEE"}
An effective system for publishing documents


## From publishing in "Quarto"{.center}
The word **Quarto** was originally a print publishing format where each page would have been a quarter the print size (depending on margin and trim point).

## To publishing in Quarto {.center}

- The Quarto we are referring to today is a system for publishing documents into a number of common digital formats though it can also be optimised to allow for designing print publications. 
- Built as the evolution of R Markdown, it allows for a multi language system that supports code in Python, R, JavaScript and Julia.
- Quarto allows users to publish reporting from a combination of MarkDown and Code to numerous formats including MS Word, HTML, ePub, Revealjs, MS PowerPoint, and many more
